responsibilities: Author research papers to share and generate impact of research results across function and in the research community.
Help in growing research business by sharing research trends and best practices within the community.
Drive project work by defining the data structure, framework, design, and evaluation metrics for research solution development and implementation.
Identify timelines and obtain resources needed for project work.
Identify new and upcoming research areas by interacting with potential external and internal collaborators.
Help in developing long-term research strategy and plans to expand the impact of Google research.
Identify defined problems/gaps in existing technology and engage stakeholders and leaders to address them.
qualifications: Coding experience in Python, JavaScript, R, Java, or C++.
Ability to lead research efforts and influence other researchers.
Ability to manage deadlines and deliverables.
Ability to apply the latest theories to develop new and improved products, processes, or technologies.
Ability to create experiments and prototype implementations.
Ability to collaborate with product teams to bring innovations to real-world impact.
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills listed do not explicitly mention Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The responsibilities focus on authoring research papers, sharing research trends, driving project work, identifying new research areas, and developing long-term research strategies. The skills required include coding experience, leading research efforts, managing deadlines, applying theories to develop new products, creating experiments, designing architectures, and collaborating with product teams.

While these responsibilities and skills could potentially be related to a wide range of research areas, there is no direct indication that they specifically involve working with GenAI or LLMs. The job seems to be more broadly focused on research and development in technology without a specific emphasis on language models or generative AI technologies.

Therefore, based on the information provided, it is not clear that the job involves working with Generative AI or language models.
